div.sent: We all have our likes and dislikes.
We can express our opinion to have something according to our liking.
We can also express our disliking.
We will honour the opinion of one another.
We will give importance to one another opinion.
We accept the opinion of the majority in every work.
Consequently the democratic attitude will be developed among us.
We may express our opinion in various ways at home.
We take decisions about all sorts of work at home.
We will If express our own opinions to buy these things.
We will give our opinion to decorate the rooms of our home.
To keep the home neat and clean, we will express our opinion.
We will give our opinions about the other activities of home.
Let us copy in the notebooks the following table and fill it in.
We will also express our opinions on the various activities of the school.
We will work according to the opinion of the majority.
We have many classmates in our class.
We will give our opinion to find out the way to make the classroom tidy.
We will take our decision about these things according to the opinion of the majority.
All will accept the decision.
The class captain performs various types of duties.
To assist the teacher in various tasks is his main duty.
The class captain maintains contact with the class teacher and the headmaster for different purposes.
We have understood the importance of a class captain.
For this reason it is essential to elect somebody competent as class captain.
In Class Three we have learnt the method of electing a captain by raising hands.
The teacher, will find out the candidates who want to be the class captain.
If there is more than one, the teacher will write their names on the board.
Then he will give a piece of paper to each of the students.
We all will write only the name of our own favourite candidate secretly.
Finishing writing, we will keep the paper folded in our hands.
Now we will give this to the teacher in a queue.
We have friends of our age in our own neighbourhood.
There are many people of different ages.
We will take the opinions of all of them in various tasks.
We will take decisions about keeping our area neat and clean.
We will choose the place to put garbage according to the decision of the majority.
We may take up various steps to maintain law and order in our area.
We can also do various sorts of developmental work including planting trees.
We will arrange cultural and sports programmes in our area.
In these activities we will take decision according to the opinion of the majority.
We get various kinds of benefit out of it.
In order to live together in harmony we will value the opinions of one another.
We will work on the basis of the majority opinion.
We have the right to express our opinions on the different activities of the State.
For this there are different ways.
These- ways are given below.
To take a decision, an election is arranged to get the opinion of the majority.
Bangladesh is a democratic country.
We have a national parliament.
It is the main democratic institution of the country.
These are formed under the constitution and various laws of the country.
These institutions are run by the participation of the people.
The people elect their representatives to govern these institutions.
In a modern democratic state election is one of the means to form government.
The candidate who gets the highest number of votes is elected as the representative.
The vote is one of the means to express opinion.
In the democratic system the people of the country are the sole sources of power.
The people exercise their power through the vote.
They choose their representatives through the vote.
This is how they take part in the administration of the country.
The elected person is a representative of the people.
We will give vote to a candidate of our own choice.
We will accept as our representative the candidate who will get the most votes.
When we are older, some of us will be candidates in elections.
We, as the elected representatives, will always work towards the realisation of people's rights.
